mesa 0.1.0
  • Reference

    This function takes a qseaSet and makes a new sample by mixing two samples

    mixArrayWithQset.Rd

    This function takes a qseaSet and makes a new sample by mixing two samples

    mixArrayWithQset(
  qseaSet,
  arrayReadTable,
  arraySample,
  qseaSample,
  nReadsTotal,
  proportion,
  newName = NULL,
  groupName = NULL,
  onlyNew = FALSE
)

    Arguments

    qseaSet

    The qseaSet object.

    arrayReadTable

    Data frame with the array probe beta values

    arraySample

    Name of the array sample to mix

    qseaSample

    Name of the qseaSet sample to mix with

    nReadsTotal

    Number of reads in total to have after mixing

    proportion

    The proportion to take from sample1, the rest will come from sample2

    newName

    A name to give the new sample

    groupName

    A name to use in the group column in the sampleTable

    onlyNew

    Whether to only return the new sample.

    Value

    A qseaSet object with an extra

    Contents

    Developed by Simon Pearce, Steven Hill.
